result.title: Weak Tests For Codeforces Round #125 Div.2 (Problem D)
result.content:
I think the tests for this problem are weak because I've submitted a DFS for this problem and the DFS doesn't do the right work. check it out :21324539

on problem :198B - Jumping on Walls I'll be thankful if anybody gives me a test or a proof on the algorithm. :)
